FILE: cm140365v11.0.txt
DYAD: BRAZIL - RUSSIA/USSR
RIVALRY: RIV329
DISPUTE(S): MID2860 MID2923 

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20170721
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20170729

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID2860 

TERRMID: MID2860 3 -- not territory
TERRMID-CER: MID2860 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID2860 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID2860 1 -- certain
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID2860 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID2860 1 -- certain
MARITMID-NOTES: MID2860 from MID-B data, this MID has date 3/24/1959. From NYT 3/29/1959, Brazil officially warned Russia not to violate its territorial waters with fishing boats. Coded not maritime because the maritime border was not disputed. 

ISLMID: MID2860 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID2860 1 -- certain
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID2860 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID2860 1 -- certain
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID2860 3 -- not civil war link
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID2860 1 -- certain
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID2860 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID2860 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID2860 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID2860 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

MID2923 

TERRMID: MID2923 3 -- not territory
TERRMID-CER: MID2923 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID2923 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID2923 1 -- certain
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID2923 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID2923 1 -- certain
MARITMID-NOTES: MID2923 from MID-B data, this MID has date range 5/4/1968-5/18/1968. From NYT 5/9/1968, Brazil seized a Soviet ship for unauthorized presence in Brazilian waters. Brazil had previously warned Soviet ships to not enter its territorial waters. Coded not maritime because the border was not disputed. 

ISLMID: MID2923 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID2923 1 -- certain
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID2923 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID2923 1 -- certain
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID2923 3 -- not civil war link
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID2923 1 -- certain
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID2923 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID2923 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID2923 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID2923 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES:
